attacks.name: Crush
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to Onix. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Spy
attacks.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck. Put them back in the same order.

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Rob
attacks.text: Look at your opponent's hand. Choose all Technical Machine and Pokémon Tool cards there and put them into his or her deck. Your opponent shuffles the deck afterward.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Fishing Tail
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Baby Pokémon, Basic Pokémon, Evolution card, or basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and then put it into your hand.

cards.name: Lightning Cube 01
text: Discard all Energy cards attached to this Pokémon. Then, flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards discarded that way. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

ability.name: Crystal Type
ability.text: Whenever you attach a Water, Lightning, or Psychic basic Energy card from your hand to Kingdra, Kingdra's type (color) becomes the same as that Energy card type until the end of the turn.

attacks.name: Aquabomb
attacks.text: Kingdra does 10 damage to itself. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance when Kingdra damages itself with this attack.)

attacks.name: Dual Burn
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each tails, discard 1 Energy card attached to Kingdra.

attacks.name: Minor Errand-Running
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, search your deck for a basic Energy card. Show those cards to your opponent and then put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Pokémon Fan Club
text: Search your deck for up to 2 Baby Pokémon and/or Basic Pokémon cards and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Darkness Energy (Special)
text: If the Pokémon Darkness Energy is attached to damages the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), the attack does 10 more damage to the Defending Pokémon. At the end of every turn, put 1 damage counter on the Pokémon Darkness Energy is attached to, unless it's or has Dark in its name. Darkness Energy provides Energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

cards.name: Boost Energy
text: Boost Energy can be attached only to an Evolved Pokémon. Discard Boost Energy at the end of the turn it was attached. Boost Energy provides Energy. The Pokémon Boost Energy is attached to can't retreat. If the Pokémon Boost Energy is attached to isn't an Evolved Pokémon, discard Boost Energy.

ability.name: Crystal Type
ability.text: Whenever you attach a Fire, Water, or Psychic basic Energy card from your hand to Lugia, Lugia's type (color) becomes the same as that as that Energy card type until the end of the turn.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Steam Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Lugia.

ability.name: Extreme Speed
ability.text: You pay Colorless less to retreat Arcanine for each Energy attached to it.

attacks.name: Fire Blow
attacks.text: You may discard any number of Energy cards attached to Arcanine when you use this attack. If you do, flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards you discarded. This attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage for each heads.

ability.name: Bubble Turn
ability.text: Once during your turn )before your attack), if Azumarill is on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, return Azumarill and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Aqua Sonic
attacks.text: Don't apply Resistance.

ability.name: Happy Healing
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have any Benched Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those Pokémon. Remove 1 damage counter from that Pokémon for each Energy attached to Blissey. This power can't be used if Blissey is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Smash Bomber
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Pure Body
ability.text: To attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Entei, you must discard an Energy card attached to Entei. (Attach the Fire Energy, and then discard an Energy from Entei.)

attacks.name: Burning Fang
attacks.text: You may flip a coin. If heads, discard a Energy card attached to Entei and the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Miracle Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition (Asleep, Burned, Confused, Paralysed, or Poisoned). The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Roasting Heat
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Burned, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Super Eggsplosion
attacks.text: Discard any number of Energy cards attached to any number of your Pokémon. Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards discarded this way. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Called Shot
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon for each of those Energy attached to Exeggutor. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Sleep Pendulum
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Hypno is your Active Pokémon, you may make the Defending Pokémon Asleep. This power can't be used if Hypno is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Spiral Aura
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon isn't Knocked Out by the damage from this attack, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch the Defending Pokémon with it.

attacks.name: Fireworks
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 1 Energy card attached to Houndoom.

attacks.name: Dark Impact
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers until the end of your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Ion Coating
ability.text: You may use this power once during each of your turn (before your attack). All Lightning Energy attached to your Active Pokémon becomes Water Energy for the rest of your turn. (This effect ends if your Active Pokémon retreats or is returned to your hand). This power can't be used if Lanturn is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Electric Tackle
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Lanturn. Flip a coin. If tails, Lanturn does 10 damage to itself for each Energy attached to it.

ability.name: Water Cyclone
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy from your Active Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Kingdra is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Rapids
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon, if any. it.

cards.name: Traveling Salesman
text: Search your deck for up to 2 Technical Machine and/or Pokémon Tool cards, show them to your opponent, and then put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Earth Rift
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Then, flip a coin. If tails, this attack can't be used during your next turn. 10

attacks.name: Iron Smash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both are heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage. If both are tails, this attack does nothing. If 1 is heads and 1 is tails, this attack just does 50 damage.

attacks.name: Copy
attacks.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. Copy copies that attack. This attack does nothing if Sudowoodo doesn't have the Energy necessary to use that attack. (You must still do anything else required in order to use that attack.)

attacks.name: Energy Draw
attacks.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to Sudowoodo. Shuffle your deck afterward.

ability.name: Miracle Shift
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), discard a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, choose a basic Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Togetic is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Mini-Metronome
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. Mini-Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required in order to use that attack.) (No matter what type the Defending Pokémon is, Togetic is still ). Togetic performs that attack.

ability.name: Dark Moon
ability.text: As long as Umbreon is your Active Pokémon and has a Dark Energy attached to it, once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at your opponent's hand. Choose from it a number of cards up to the number of Dark Energy attached to Umbreon and shuffle them into your opponent's deck. Your opponent then draws the same number of cards from his or her deck. This power can't be used if Umbreon is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Shadow Bind
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Fragrance Trap
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch the Defending Pokémon with it. This power can't be used if Victreebel is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Corrosive Acid
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

ability.name: Poison Resistance
ability.text: Scizor can't become Poisoned.

attacks.name: Snatch
attacks.text: Before doing damage, if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon with no damage counters on it, you may choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Heavy Metal
attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Metal Energy attached to Scizor. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Earth Rift
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Then, flip a coin. If tails, this attack can't be used during your next turn.

attacks.name: Iron Smash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both are heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage. If both are tails, this attack does nothing. If 1 is heads and 1 is tails, this attack just does 50 damage.

attacks.name: Copy
attacks.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. Copy copies that attack. This attack does nothing if Sudowoodo doesn't have the Energy necessary to use that attack. (You must still do anything else required in order to use that attack.)

attacks.name: Energy Draw
attacks.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to Sudowoodo. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Undersea Ruins
text: Once during each player's turn (before attacking), that player may flip a coin. If heads, that player chooses 1 of his or her Evolved Pokémon in play and discards the top Evolution card from that Pokémon, devolving it.

ability.name: Miracle Shift
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), discard a basic Energy card attached to one of your Pokémon. Then choose a basic Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Togetic is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Mini-Metronome
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. Mini-Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required in order to use that attack.) (No matter what type the Defending Pokémon is, Togetic is still ). Togetic performs the attack.

attacks.name: Destructive Roar
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gigacrush
attacks.text: Each player discards the top 3 cards from his or her deck.

ability.name: Fragrance Trap
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch the Defending Pokémon with it. This power can't be used if Victreebel is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Corrosive Acid
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

ability.name: Anti

attacks.text: If there are any Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads attach 1 of those Energy cards to Zapdos.

attacks.name: Lightning Storm
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, put 2 damage counters on Zapdos.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Distortion Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Poison Horn
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: Nidorino does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Seadra. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

ability.text: You pay Colorless less to retreat Skiploom for each Grass Energy attached to it.

attacks.name: Break Powder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, this attack does 10 damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Sleep Inducer
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Growth
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 Energy cards from your hand to Weepinbell.

attacks.name: Double Razor Leaf

attacks.name: Skedaddle
attacks.text: Return Aipom and all basic Energy cards attached to it to your hand. If you have no Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Poison Vine
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Sharp Leaf
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Cubone by attacks is reduced by 20.

attacks.name: Charge Up
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for an Energy card and attach it to Eevee. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.text: Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

attacks.name: Poison Horn
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Paint Trick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. Then, choose 1 of your Benched Pokémon and switch Smeargle with it.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Sharp Stinger
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: Apricorn Forest
text: Once during each player's turn (before attacking), if that player's Bench isn't full, that player flips a coin. If heads, that player shows his or her opponent a basic Energy card from his or her hand. Then, that player searches his or her deck for a Basic Pokémon card of the same type (color) as the revealed Energy card and puts it onto his or her Bench. The player shuffles his or her deck afterward.

cards.name: Fire Cube 01
text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

cards.name: Healing Berry
text: At the end of any turn, if the Pokémon this card is attached to has 20 HP or less, remove 3 damage counters from that Pokémon and discard this card.

cards.name: Pokémon Park
text: Once during each of his or her turns, when a player attaches an Energy card from his or her hand to 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, he or she removes 1 damage counter, if any, from that Pokémon.

cards.name: Psychic Cube 01
text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

cards.name: Super Energy Removal 2
text: Flip 2 coins. If both are heads, discard all Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon. If both are tails, discard all Energy cards attached to your Active Pokémon. If 1 is heads and 1 is tails, this card does nothing.

cards.name: Town Volunteers
text: Take 5 Baby Pokémon, Basic Pokémon, Evolution, and/or basic Energy cards from your discard pile and then show them to your opponent. Shuffle them into your deck.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.text: If you have any Benched Pokémon and if there are any basic Energy cards attached to Ampharos, take 1 of those Energy cards and attach it to 1 of those Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fire Blow
attacks.text: You may discard any number of Energy cards attached to Arcanine. If you do, flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards you discarded in this way. This attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage for each heads.

ability.name: Super Dynamo
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Electrode is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, choose a Lightning Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Electrode is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Super Eggsplosion
attacks.text: Discard any number of Energy cards attached to any of your Pokémon. Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards discarded this way. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the amount of Energy attached to Scizor. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

ability.text: As long as there is a Grass Energy attached to Muk, you must pay an additional ColorlessColorless to retreat it.

attacks.name: Burning Sludge
attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the amount of Energy attached to Muk. If any of them are heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned and Burned.

ability.name: Backup
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, you may draw cards until you have exactly 3 cards in your hand. This power can't be used if Porygon2 is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Ray
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Rapidash.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Lightning Storm
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, put 2 damage counters on Zapdos.

ability.name: Dense Body

attacks.name: Energy Cannon
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Slowbro but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage this way. y.

ability.name: Pure Body

attacks.name: Hypno Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, this attack does 30 damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

ability.name: Scavenger Hunt

Then search your deck for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Furret is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray

attacks.name: Rush

attacks.name: Smash Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Energy Barrier
ability.text: If Mr. Mime would be damaged by an attack, reduce that damage by 10 for each basic Energy card attached to Mr. Mime. The maximum amount of damage that can be reduced by Energy Barrier is 20.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.text: Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

attacks.name: Spore
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.text: Search your deack for a card that evolves from Paras. Attach it to Paras. This counts as evolving Paras. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
